definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: goodwill, favour, acceptance, will;—abs. ´[[י]]: De 33:23 +; cstr. [[רְחוֹן]] Ps 145:19 +; sf. [[רְחוֹנִי]] Is 60:10, [[רְחׂנוֹ]] Da 8:4 +, etc.;—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of men: in gen. Pr 10:32, Pr 11:27, Pr 14:9; of kings v:Pr 14:35, Pr 16:13, Pr 16:15, Pr 19:12.

acceptance, of persons, offering sacrifice, [[לרחון לפני יהוה]] Ex 28:38 (P); c. [[ל]] pers. for acceptance for him before ´[[י]]:; c. sf. pers. [[לרחנוֹ]] Le 1:3; abbrev. [[לְרָחוֹן לָכֶם]] Le 22:20, [[לרחנכם]] Le 19:5, Le 22:19, Le 22:29, Le 23:11, [[לצֵּון]] Le 22:21, Is 56:7, Je 6:20, Ps 19:15 (of words; cf. Ho 14:3); [[על רחון]] Is 60:7 (read [[לְ]], so Codd., v. Gi, also Du), [[רחון]] Mal 2:13.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, ´[[עשׂה ר]]: do his will Ezr 10:11, Ps 40:9, Ps 103:21, Ps 143:10.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, [[עשׂה]] [[כרחונוֹ]] do according to his will, exactly as he pleased, Da 8:4, Da 11:3, Da 11:16, Da 11:36, Ne 9:24, Es 1:8, Es 9:5, cf. Ne 9:37; desire Ps 145:16, Ps 145:19, 2Ch 15:15; = self-will Ge 49:6 (poem).
